DOC.brief_summary: The research objectives are to test the efficacy of a Modified CIMT treatment in babies diagnosed with hemiplegia, treated in a home program, as compared to a control group of babies receiving a parallel home program but with no CIMT.
DOC.brief_title: Constraint Induced Movement Therapy (CIMT) in Babies Home Program
DOC.criteria: Babies age 718 months diagnosed with Hemiplegic cerebral palsy Epilepsy not treated
